snippet: Cory Dunton, 16, who pleaded not guilty to attempted murder and assault on Tuesday, wrote a three-page letter of apology, brimming with remorse and angst, to a 14-year-old victim.
lead_paragraph: Cory Dunton, 16, who pleaded not guilty to attempted murder and assault on Tuesday, wrote a three-page letter of apology, brimming with remorse and angst, to a 14-year-old victim.
abstract: Cory Dunton, 16-year-old boy who pleaded not guilty to attempted murder and assault in shooting at crowded Bryant Park ice skating rink, writes three-page letter of apology filled with remorse to 14-year-old victim Adonis Mera, who is paralyzed from incident; Dunton's target was Javier Contreras, who had refused to hand over his winter coat minutes before shooting.

headline.main: Suspect in Ice Rink Shooting Writes Apology to a Victim
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Ice Rink Shooting Writes Apology to a Victim
